#BlackMagicCraft #Episode106

In this episode I show you how I approach the subject of interiors on tabletop RPG buildings. I also do a show n tell of some of the buildings I have built over the years including a few two storey buildings. 

CHECK OUT THE DARK CATHEDRAL BUILD:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fljQAX0XO1o&t=310s

CHECK OUT THE FARMHOUSE BUILD:
Part 1: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VYFkKLOSuz4&t=20s
Part 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hwjl_JSqJT0

title: Multi-Level Buildings with Playable Interiors for TABLETOP GAMES
